mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM yssp_custom_artwork WHERE Custom_Artwork_status =1
AND Custom_Artwork_type = #{customArtworkType,jdbcType=TINYINT}
AND ( Custom_Artwork_name like '%${customArtworkName}%' OR Custom_Artwork_authName like '%${customArtworkName}%' )
ORDER BY Custom_Artwork_createTime DESC
